title: Aerobics
desc: High-energy group workouts combining cardio moves and music to improve stamina, burn calories, and boost heart health.

title: Personal Training
desc: Customized one-on-one coaching tailored to your fitness goals, providing guidance, motivation, and accountability.

title: Weight Training
desc: Strength-building exercises using free weights, machines, and bodyweight to tone muscles and enhance physical performance.

title: Karate
desc: Martial arts classes promoting self-defense, discipline, and fitness through dynamic techniques and training.

title: Zumba
desc: Dance-based cardio sessions set to upbeat music, blending fun and fitness to keep you energized and motivated.

title: Nutrition Guidance
desc: Expert advice on healthy eating and meal planning to complement your fitness journey and achieve lasting results.
